column1: 1. Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large skillet. Add onion
column3: and bell pepper and sauté for 4-5 minutes
column4: until fragrant and vegetables begin to soften.

column1: 2. Add rice and stir to lightly toast for about 1 minute.
3. Add chicken broth and diced tomatoes
column2: and season with paprika and cumin. Bring to a low boil
column3: cover and reduce heat to low
column4: cooking for 18-20 minutes until rice is tender.

column1: 4. Make two “wells” in the rice and crack an egg into each well. Increase heat to medium and cook
column2: covered for about 5 minutes until egg whites are cooked but the yolks are still runny.

column3: and cook for 1 or 2 minutes more until cheese is melted then serve. Enjoy!$null\$null\\$null\\\$null\\\\$null\\\\\$
